attributes.action: Stop the government blocking the sun with geo engineering
attributes.additional_details: It’s dangerous to humans and wildlife spraying the skies with chemicals
attributes.background: Ask the people if they agree to the government’s mad policy

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
